info.title: MobilePacketCoreManagementClient
info.description: The definitions in this swagger specification will be used for Mobile Packet Core Deep Packet Inspection ( DPI ) resource.

put.description: Creates or updates a Mobile Packet Core Deep Packet Inspection resource

parameters.name: deepPacketInspectionName
parameters.description: The name of the deepPacketInspection object.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update a Deep Packet Inspection object

200.description: Creates/Updates the Mobile Packet Core Deep Packet Inspection resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about the specified Mobile Packet Core Deep Packet Inspection resource

parameters.name: deepPacketInspectionName
parameters.description: The name of the deepPacketInspection object.

200.description: Retrieves the Mobile Packet Core Deep Packet Inspection resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Mobile Packet Core Deep Packet Inspection resource

parameters.name: deepPacketInspectionName
parameters.description: The name of the deepPacketInspection object.

200.description: Successful: The deep packet inspection object has been deleted

204.description: Successful: The deep packet inspection object does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the Deep Packet Inspection instances in a mobile packet core instance.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of component resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

tetheringQualityIndexValue.description: Percentage value for Quality Index (Confidence Index ) to mark connection as tethered 1..100

tetheringQualityIndexResultWeightPercent.description: Percentage value for Quality Index (Confidence Index ) weight for ttl method
Percentage value for Quality Index (Confidence Index ) weight for user-agent method
Percentage value for Quality Index (Confidence Index ) weight for tcp-fingerprinting
Percentage value for Quality Index (Confidence Index ) weight for google quic user agent

tetheringDetectionAlgorithmTtl.description: Admin state for running tethering detection algorithm using ttl

tetheringDetectionAlgorithmUserAgent.description: Admin state for running tethering detection algorithm using user-agent

tetheringDetectionAlgorithmTcpFingerprin.description: Admin state for running tethering detection algorithm using tcp fingerprinting - Changes to this object do not take effect until the next POD restart

tetheringDetectionAlgorithmGoogleQuicUse.description: Admin state for running tethering detection algorithm using google quic useragent - Changes to this object do not take effect until the next POD restart

tetheringDetectionAlgorithmTtlConnection.description: Admin state for running tethering detection algorithm using ttl by taking connection tracking into consideration

tetheringDetectionAlgorithmTetheringDete.description: Admin state for running tethering detection algorithm using the tethering detection confidence index

tetheringDetectionTetheringDetectionConf.description: Tethering Detection Confidence Index weight in percentage for ttl method
Tethering Detection Confidence Index weight in percentage for user-agent method
Tethering Detection Confidence Index weight in percentage for tcp-fingerprinting
Tethering Detection Confidence Index weight in percentage for Google Quick UDP Internet Connections user agent

attributeDetectionPacketLimit.description: The maximum number of packets to detect flow-attribute of a dpi flow

attributeDetectionOnlyFirstFlowAttribute.description: Consider only first attribute of a flow for rule match

controlAppsSkipAttributeCheck.description: Admin state to enable/disable attribute check for marking control connections in Control Flow Feature

optimizeDeepPacketInspectionRules.description: Evaluate required rules based on reclassification event trigger

optimizeProtocolApplicationRuleGroupRule.description: Evaluate protocol and application rule group rules configured may match to classification event

tetheringDetectionPacketLimit.description: The maximum number of packets of a flow to be analysed for tethering detection, default is 64. The minimum value that can be configured is 3

deepPacketInspectionPacketCountWithProxy.description: Set the max packet count for dpi processing when proxy is enabled,0 is for all packets
